attributes.action: Stop NAAFI and EFI from charging our forces personnel over the odds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: NAAFI runs shops for the armed forces in places like Germany and the Falklands.  They also run shops known as EFIs in places like Iraq and Afghanistan.  The problem is they always charge over the odds for their goods.  Whilst other nations have tax free PXs, we the British seem to pay more than at home.
